description.label: The label of the button
description.href: Where should the button link to?
description.target: Open a new tab or not?
description.componentElement: The tag to use for this component
description.color: The color of an outlined button
description.size: The size of the button; sm, md, lg
description.reverseIcon: Reverse the order of text and icon (default is to the left)
description.floatOnHover: An animation on the button that gives the button a box-shadow with transition
